title: Synthesis of a novel carbon-based nano-emulsifier and its application in viscosity reduction of emulsified Jurassic oil in the Sichuan Basin
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31663-31674
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05188B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Weihua Chen, Rui He, Rui Liu, Ji Zeng, Ruifeng Liu, Hancheng Wang, Wenting Guan, Zefei Lv, Bingjie Fu, Wanfen Pu
A novel carbon-based nano-emulsifer is synthesized, utilizing graphene oxide as substrate and hydrophilic alkyl glycidyl ether and polyoxyethylene ether as brushers.
